General.Name: Zhejiang Jinfei Kaida Wheel Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Jinfei Kaida Wheel Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of aluminum alloy wheels in China. It offers wheels for automobiles, motorcycles, and electric bikes. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Jinhua, China.
General.Address: No.800 Xianhua South Street, Jinhua, China, 321016
